body:
#### PR description:
Technical updates:

1.  Slightly modified interface to SimWatcher and SimProducer, old watchers should work in the same way in 1 thread jobs, added a possibility of thread safe SimWatchers or SimProducers. Do not use shared pointers.
2. TLS data structure is removed from RunManagerMTWorker, all TLS objects become class members.
3. Slightly improved debug printout
4. Corresponding modifications are added to OscarMTProducer and GeometryProducer.

No change in results are expected.
